mapper.insert:
insert into fund_manager
id,
manager_name,
job_time,
qualification,
biographical_notes,
photo,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jobTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{biographicalNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{photo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update fund_manager
manager_name = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_time = #{jobTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualification = #{qualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
biographical_notes = #{biographicalNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fund_manager set manager_name = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_time = #{jobTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qualification = #{qualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biographical_notes = #{biographicalNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fund_manager set manager_name = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_time = #{jobTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qualification = #{qualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biographical_notes = #{biographicalNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT fm.id, fm.manager_name AS managerName, fm.job_time as jobTime, fm.qualification, fm.biographical_notes as biographicalNotes, fm.photo, fim.fund_code AS fundCode FROM fund_manager fm JOIN fund_info_manager fim ON fm.id = fim.manager_id where fim.fund_code=#{fundCode}

SELECT fm.id, fm.manager_name AS managerName, fm.job_time as jobTime, fm.qualification, fm.biographical_notes as biographicalNotes, fm.photo, fim.fund_code AS fundCode FROM fund_manager fm JOIN fund_info_manager fim ON fm.id = fim.manager_id
and fm.manager_name like concat('%',#{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and fim.fund_code like concat('%',#{fundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

SELECT fm.id, fm.manager_name AS managerName, fm.job_time as jobTime, fm.qualification, fm.biographical_notes as biographicalNotes, fm.photo, fim.fund_code AS fundCode FROM fund_manager fm JOIN fund_info_manager fim ON fm.id = fim.manager_id where fm.id=#{id}
